about.summary: Quantify, profile and remove ambient mRNA contamination (the "soup") from droplet based single cell RNA-seq experiments.  Implements the method described in Young et al. (2018) <doi:10.1101/303727>.
Quantify, profile and remove ambient mRNA contamination (the "soup") from droplet based single cell RNA-seq experiments.  Implements the method described in Young et al. (2018) <doi:10.1101/303727>.

name: r-soupx
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.5.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-soupx
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/SoupX_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/SoupX/SoupX_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 308cbeac557388a59e9e4604f8686274285c777322414ed6a2b725c81bfc4714

build:
  merge_build_host: true  # [win]
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-matrix
    - r-seurat
    - r-ggplot2
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-matrix
    - r-seurat
    - r-ggplot2

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('SoupX')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('SoupX')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/constantAmateur/SoupX
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file: {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2
  summary: Quantify, profile and remove ambient mRNA contamination (the "soup") from droplet based single cell RNA-seq experiments.  Implements the method described in Young et al. (2018) <doi:10.1101/303727>.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - nh3
    - conda-forge/r

# The original CRAN metadata for this package was:

# Package: SoupX
# Title: Single Cell mRNA Soup eXterminator
# Version: 1.4.5
# Date: 2020-05-15
# Author: Matthew Daniel Young
# Maintainer: Matthew Daniel Young <my4@sanger.ac.uk>
# Description: Quantify, profile and remove ambient mRNA contamination (the "soup") from droplet based single cell RNA-seq experiments.  Implements the method described in Young et al. (2018) <doi:10.1101/303727>.
# URL: https://github.com/constantAmateur/SoupX
# Suggests: knitr, rstan, DropletUtils, rmarkdown
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# Imports: ggplot2, Matrix, methods, Seurat
# Depends: R (>= 3.5.0)
# LazyData: true
# License: GPL-2
# Encoding: UTF-8
# RoxygenNote: 7.0.2
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2020-05-15 16:36:15 UTC; my4
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2020-05-26 10:00:06 UTC
